mapper.select: SELECT * FROM project ORDER BY online_date DESC
SELECT * FROM project WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') ORDER BY online_date DESC

SELECT * FROM project WHERE (online_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}) OR (registration_end_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}) OR (expected_review_time BETWEEN #{startDateTime} AND #{endDateTime}) OR (expert_review_time BETWEEN #{startDateTime} AND #{endDateTime}) ORDER BY online_date
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project ( name, review_period, online_date, registration_period, registration_end_date, earliest_review_date, expected_review_time, expert_review_time, remark ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{reviewPeriod}, #{onlineDate}, #{registrationPeriod}, #{registrationEndDate}, #{earliestReviewDate}, #{expectedReviewTime}, #{expertReviewTime}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: UPDATE project SET name = #{name}, review_period = #{reviewPeriod}, online_date = #{onlineDate}, registration_period = #{registrationPeriod}, registration_end_date = #{registrationEndDate}, earliest_review_date = #{earliestReviewDate}, expected_review_time = #{expectedReviewTime}, expert_review_time = #{expertReviewTime}, remark = #{remark} WHERE id = #{id}
